Ok, I was thinking, it only seems fair the if we do halflings we have to do 
them from everything(excluding upgrades of their own class of course). So, 
instead of ruling out a class, we just balance it. The main problem I've 
heard is slimes, so this is what I think should be done. Some thing like 
"Due to the magical nature of the halfling, split can be dangerous." or 
something like that. These are the numbers I think we should use in the 
background(that the player won't know about of course)

20% chance of the halfling be out right destroyed.

20% chace of the halfling being seperated in the split, and each return to 
their respective class, but at half the original level.

20% chance the split is succesful but the resulting charcters are level 1

40% chance of success
